title: Job Vacancies at Stridewaves Limited
content:
Stridewaves Limited - We are a sustainability company that helps businesses and individuals thrive through environmentally sustainable practices.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) HSE Officer

Job Location: Port Harcourt, Rivers
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We're seeking a highly motivated and experienced HSE Officer to join our team.
	The successful candidate will be responsible for ensuring a safe and healthy work environment, complying with relevant laws and regulations, and promoting a culture of safety within the organization.


Key Responsibilities


	Develop and implement HSE policies, procedures, and standards
	Conduct risk assessments, audits, and inspections
	Identify and mitigate hazards
	Provide HSE training and awareness programs
	Investigate incidents and near-misses
	Ensure compliance with relevant laws, regulations, and industry standards
	Collaborate with other departments to promote HSE best practices


Requirements


	Relevant Degree or certification in HSE, Environmental Science, or related field
	Proven experience as an HSE Officer or similar role
	Strong knowledge of HSE laws, regulations, and industry standards
	Excellent communication and training skills
	Ability to work independently and lead teams.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: chigorgomi@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Note: For more enquires send messge via WhatsApp to: 08101150077.

 

 

2.) Driver

Job Location: Port Harcourt, Rivers
Employment Type: Part-time

Job Summary


	We're seeking a reliable and experienced part-time driver to support our team.
	The successful candidate will be responsible for driving company vehicles, transporting goods or personnel, and performing basic vehicle maintenance tasks.


Key Responsibilities


	Safely drive company vehicles to transport goods or personnel
	Maintain a clean and safe vehicle environment
	Perform basic vehicle maintenance tasks, such as checking oil and tire pressure
	Adhere to traffic rules and regulations
	Ensure timely pickups and deliveries


Requirements


	Valid driver's license
	Proven experience as a driver
	Good knowledge of local roads and traffic regulations
	Excellent driving record
	Ability to work independently and follow instructions.


Salary
N20,000 - N30,000 Monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: info@stridewaves.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Note: For more enquires send messge via WhatsApp to 08101150077.

 

 

3.) Marketing Officer


Job Location: Port Harcourt, Rivers
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We're seeking an experienced Marketer to develop and execute marketing strategies that drive sales, increase brand awareness, and build customer engagement.
	The successful candidate will be responsible for identifying new business opportunities, building relationships with clients, and promoting our products/services.


Key Responsibilities


	Develop and implement effective marketing strategies to achieve business objectives
	Identify new business opportunities and build relationships with clients
	Conduct market research and analyze competitors to stay ahead of industry trends
	Create and distribute marketing materials to promote our products/services
	Collaborate with cross-functional teams to achieve business goals
	Meet and exceed sales targets.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess relevant qualification with 1 - 5 years of work experience. 


Salary
N70,000 - N80,000 per month. 

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: info@stridewaves.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Note: For more enquires send messge via WhatsApp to 08101150077.

title: Job Openings at Hobark International Limited
content:
Hobark International Limited (HIL) is the parent company of the Hobark group operating in the oil and gas industry. The company was incorporated in 1998, starting as a staffing agency based in Port Harcourt. Currently we have offices in 4 countries with our head office in Lagos.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Community Relations Officer

Job Location: Port Harcourt, Rivers
Job Type: Contract

Job Description
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Strategic relationship management with various community stakeholders to the company's operations; ensuring business continuity through strategic stakeholder engagement and issues management.
	Conflict mitigation through effective grievance management techniques.
	Supporting the development and implementation of pipeline security strategies towards minimizing pipeline downtime due to community interference.
	Midwifing sustainable economic development through deployment of programmes engendering local community empowerment.


Requirements


	A minimum of a Bachelor’s Degree (B. Sc.) Degree in any of the Social Science disciplines
	Candidate must have worked in a similar role for at least ten (10) years post NYSC experience
	Demonstrate experience in working with rural communities & community groups especially in troubled areas.
	Strong interpersonal skills, including excellent verbal and written skills
	Fluency in English
	Good working knowledge of the Niger Delta area.
	Good knowledge of Microsoft Office programs.


Click here to apply online

 

 

2.) Sales Associate

Job Location: Lagos
Job Type: Permanent/Full-time

Job Description


	Meet and exceed sales targets
	Successfully create a business from new and existing customer accounts
	Manage complex negotiations with senior-level executives
	Build rapport and establish long-term relationships with customers
	Conduct market research to identify selling possibilities and evaluate customer needs
	Actively seek out new sales opportunities through cold calling, networking, and social media


Requirements


	BSc in Marketing, Business Admin, or any relevant field
	2-5 years of quota-carrying sales experience
	Proven experience as a Sales Executive or relevant role in a Finance company, ICT, or Insurance, ETC
	Experience and working knowledge of CRM systems
	Demonstrable track record of over-achieving quota
	Strong written and verbal communication skills
	Proficiency in English
	Excellent knowledge of MS Office


Click here to apply online

 

3.) Internal Auditor

Job Location: Lagos
Job Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	Support risk-based audit planning: Works with the Internal Audit Leads and Managers in scoping audit assignments and developing the audit work programs, ensuring programs address testing of controls highlighted in the risk assessment.
	Conducting audit test procedures identifying patterns and exceptions or discrepancies in supporting information and documenting audit exceptions in line with the Global IA Standards and department guidelines. Prepares the work papers, evaluates findings, and formulates recommendations for changes and/or improvements.
	Fraud risk management: Assist in designing and carrying out audit procedures to identify cases of potential fraud and misappropriation within the Group, as part of the audit plan, or as a special review at management’s request.
	In carrying out audit assignments, determine the extent of compliance with established policies, procedures, and regulations, identify control lapses in the execution of policies and processes by control owners and responsible parties, and identify risk mitigations.


Requirements


	Bachelor's Degree in Accounting or Finance
	Minimum of 5 years of cumulative working experience. Prior Big 4 accounting firm or other audit /relevant work experience is a huge plus.
	B.Eng. in Engineering Discipline or Business Administration
	Requires significant learning agility
	Professional qualification – ACA/ACCA/CIA/CISA or equivalent.
